Package gov.va.med.srcalc.web

The Web Presentation Layer of the application.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AppAttributesInitializer
    Adds informational global attributes to the ServletContext.
    DynamicValueVisitor
    A ValueVisitor that adds a key value pair to the dynamic values used on the enter variables page to fill values for the input fields.
    SrcalcUrls
    Provides a single point of definition for URLs to various resources.
    WebUtils
    Web application-related constants and utility methods.

Package gov.va.med.srcalc.web Description

The Web Presentation Layer of the application. These classes present the application data to users (whether humans or machines) and, as appropriate, allow those users to modify the data.

This layer uses a Model-View-Controller design and, specifically, the Spring Web MVC Framework.

The Model objects are of two categories:

  1. the direct objects returned by the Service Layer (e.g., Calculation) when they already contain all the properties that the view requires; or
  2. operation-specific wrappers (e.g., EditBooleanVar) when the view requires extra properties.

The Views are standard JSPs with a custom tag library. The custom tag library provides the master page layout (via the basePage and adminPage tags) and utility tags such as the variableSpecific tag.

The Controllers are classes annotated with Spring's @Controller.

See Also:
gov.va.med.srcalc.web.controller
